casebody.data:
The People of the State of New York, Respondent, v. Leonard Abruzzese, Appellant.

Judgment of the Court of Special Sessions of the City of New York, Borough of Brooklyn, convicting defendant of a violation of section 188 of the Agriculture and Markets Law, unanimously affirmed. (See People v. Ring, post, p. 709, decided herewith.) Present — Lazansky, P. J., Carswell, Johnston, Adel and Close, JJ.
